channel.title: Red x's glitch.
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I was messing around in ST at the dam spawning npc's and such, but when I spawned a few alien controllers, red x's started spewing out of all npc's, this has never happened when I've spawned alien controllers before, so I don't know what the problem is. I didn't take a snapshot or video, but here is an example of what the x's look like [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PDIbu30zhqk[/url]
So how do I fix it and what caused it to happen?

item.title: Red x's glitch.
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
Have you taken a look at the console, yet?

If so, do you see any lines similiar to the one below?:

[COLOR=’#FF0000’]Could not load material ‘/materials/particle/blood1/blood.vtf’

Note: This is just an example.

Just take a screenshot of the console and upload / link it here, if you want to.

Read full topic

item.title: Red x's glitch.
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Hey everyone, I was messing around in ST at the dam spawning npc’s and such, but when I spawned a few alien controllers, red x’s started spewing out of all npc’s, this has never happened when I’ve spawned alien controllers before, so I don’t know what the problem is. I didn’t take a snapshot or video, but here is an example of what the x’s look like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PDIbu30zhqk
